extends java.lang.Object
    Math utilities.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double gamma(double x)
      Returns the value of the gamma function: Gamma(x) = integral( t^(x-1) e^(-t), t = 0 .. infinity)
      static double getDistance(double[] point1, double[] point2)
      Returns the Euclidian distance between two double arrays.
      static double getMinEuclidianDistance(java.util.Collection<double[]> points)
      Returns the minimal Euclidian distance between any two pairs of points in the collection of points provided as argument.
      static double getVolume(double radius, int dimension)
      Returns the volume of an N-ball of a certain radius.
      static boolean isLower(double[] a, double[] b)
      Returns true is all elements in the array a have a lower value than the corresponding elements in the array b

      • isLower

        public static boolean isLower(double[] a,
                              double[] b)
        Returns true is all elements in the array a have a lower value than the corresponding elements in the array b
        Parameters:
        a - the first array
        b - the second array
        Returns:
        true is a is lower than b in all dimensions, and false otherwise

      • getMinEuclidianDistance

        public static double getMinEuclidianDistance(java.util.Collection<double[]> points)
        Returns the minimal Euclidian distance between any two pairs of points in the collection of points provided as argument.
        Parameters:
        points - the collection of points
        Returns:
        the minimum distance between all possible pairs of points

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the gamma value fo the point

        Parameters:

        dimension - the number of dimensions to consider
        Returns:
